bioAsHtml:
Iulian Dragos is one of the co-founders of Triplequote, a tooling company focused on enterprise needs for Scala providing the first parallel Scala compiler. He is one of the top committers to the Scala IDE and Scala projects. He has learned Scala by writing the backend for it during his PhD in Martin Odersky's research lab at EPFL, back in 2004, and worked on various parts of the compiler and ecosystem since then.

Before Triplequopte he was the first employee at Lightbend (formerly Typesafe), a start-up founded by the language creator, Martin Odersky, where he worked on development tools for Scala and later lead the Apache Spark team at Lightbend.
bio:

He is one of the top committers to the Scala IDE and Scala projects. He has learned Scala by writing the backend for it during his PhD in Martin Odersky's research lab at EPFL, back in 2004, and worked on various parts of the compiler and ecosystem since then.

Before Triplequopte he was the first employee at Lightbend (formerly Typesafe), a start-up founded by the language creator, Martin Odersky, where he worked on development tools for Scala and later lead the Apache Spark team at Lightbend.
